remoteClasses.name: PlumberEndpoint
remoteClasses.doc: Endpoint that allows remote pipelines to negotiate the format of the media as well as to send data over SCTP. A :rom:cls:`PlumberEndpoint` contains paired sink and source :rom:cls:`MediaPad` for audio and video. This API is still under development so it might change without requiring a version change.

params.name: localAddres
params.doc: IP Address where this endpoint will be waiting for incoming connections

params.name: remoteAddres
params.doc: IP Address where this end point will connect to
